TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage

summary.span: 表示请求安全标记的 wst:RequestSecurity 元素（RST）。

span.span: Represents the wst:RequestSecurityToken element (RST), which is used to request a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wst: requestsecuritytoken 元素 （消息） 包含的参数和用于从安全令牌服务 (STS) 请求安全令牌的属性。The wst:RequestSecurityToken element (message) contains the parameters and properties used to request a security token from a security token service (STS). 消息 （或元素） 被缩写为 RST 中。The message (or element) is abbreviated as RST. 类包含表示的 RST 元素的属性。The class contains properties that represent the elements of the RST. RST 可以形成与任何通过 WS 信任; 定义的请求绑定相对应的请求例如，颁发绑定、 续订绑定、 验证绑定或取消绑定。An RST can form a request that corresponds to any of the request bindings defined by WS-Trust; for example, the Issuance binding, the Renewal binding, the Validate binding, or the Cancel binding. 中的属性的许多类对应于仅在特定类型的请求定义的这些绑定中存在的元素。Many of the properties in the class correspond to elements that are present only in specific kinds of requests as defined by these bindings. 根据请求特定种类对象都表示或特定请求，它表示中存在的参数，该对象的某些属性可能是`null`。Depending on the kind of request a particular object represents or the parameters present in the specific request that it represents, some properties of the object may be `null`. STS 返回请求的响应中包含 requestsecuritytokenresponse 元素 (RSTR) 的消息。The STS returns a response to the request in a message that contains a wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse element (RSTR). 此消息由类。This message is represented by the class. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)] ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，它包含一个实现被动 STS 能够提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 由派生自的类实现 STS 。The STS is implemented by a class that is derived from . 方法的许多类从其令牌颁发管道 take 调用对象作为一个 if 及其参数。Many of the methods of the class that are called from its token issuance pipeline take a object as one if their parameters. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 该方法采用作为其参数之一，此参数的属性，用于设置属性上方法返回的对象。The method takes a as one of its parameters and properties of this parameter are used to set properties on the object that is returned by the method. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#4)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#5)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ActAs { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求者尝试充当的标识的安全令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the security token for the identity that the requestor is attempting to act as.

value.span: 表示该标识的请求者正在尝试。

span.span: A that represents the identity the requestor is attempting to act as.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:ActAs 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:ActAs element. 此可选元素支持委派方案，指示请求者正在发出的请求作为另一个标识。This optional element supports delegation scenarios and indicates that the requestor is making the request to act as another identity. 此元素是在 Ws-trust 1.4 中引入的。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性是`null`中不涉及委托的请求。This property is `null` in requests that don't involve delegation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ AdditionalContext { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的附加上下文信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the additional context information for the request.

value.span: 包含请求的附加上下文信息的 。

span.span: An that contains the additional context information for the request.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示的 additionalcontext 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the auth:AdditionalContext element. 此可选元素提供安全令牌服务 (STS) 可以在令牌颁发过程中使用的其他信息。This optional element provides additional information that the security token service (STS) can use in the token issuance process.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ CancelTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 WS-Trust 取消请求中取消的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be canceled in a WS-Trust cancel request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含要取消的令牌。

span.span: A that contains the token to be cancelled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:CancelTarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:CancelTarget element. 此元素包含有关要在 WS 信任取消请求取消的标记信息。This element carries the information about the token to be cancelled in a WS-Trust cancel request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Claims As RequestClaimCollection

summary.span: 获取客户端（请求者）请求的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim types requested by the client (requestor).

value.span: 一个 ，包含所需的声明。

span.span: A that contains the requested claims.

value.span: 默认值为空集合。

span.span: The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:Claims 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Claims element. 此可选元素请求的客户端请求的特定声明类型的集合。This optional element requests the set of specific claim types requested by the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ComputedKeyAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ComputedKeyAlgorithm : string with get, set

summary.span: 当计算密钥被用于公开的标记时，获取表示拟用期望算法的 URI。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

value.span: 字符串包含表示密钥算法的 URI。

span.span: A string that contains the URI that represents the computed key algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:ComputedKeyAlgorithm 元素。Represents the wst:ComputedKeyAlgorithm element. 此可选元素指定一个 URI，表示要使用计算的密钥用于已颁发的令牌时，所需的算法。This optional element specifies a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Delegatable As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Delegatable { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Delegatable : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定是否应将颁发的令牌标记为可委派的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked as delegatable.

value.span: 如果已发布标记为可委托，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the issued token is delegatable; otherwise, .

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst 的内容： 可委托元素。Represents the contents of the wst:Delegatable element. 此可选元素指示返回的令牌，可能是可委派到另一方。This optional element indicates that the returned token may be delegatable to another party. 此元素是在 Ws-trust 1.4 中引入的。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性与结合使用属性。This property used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ DelegateTo { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应向其委派已颁发令牌的标识。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.

value.span: 表示应委托已发布的标志的标识的 。

span.span: A that represents the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:DelegateTo 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:DelegateTo element. 此可选元素指示颁发的令牌可以委派给指定的标识。This optional element indicates that the issued token be delegated to the specified identity. 此元素是在 Ws-trust 1.4 中引入的。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性是`null`中不涉及委托的请求。This property is `null` in requests that don't involve delegation. 结合使用此属性属性。This property is used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ Encryption { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置令牌信息以及加密时要使用的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets information on the token and key to use when encrypting.

value.span: 一个包含加密信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the encrypting information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:Encryption 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Encryption element. 此可选元素指示应该指定令牌加密的已颁发的安全令牌中的所有返回的机密。This optional element indicates that any returned secrets in issued security tokens should be encrypted for the specified token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Forwardable As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Forwardable { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Forwardable : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定是否应将颁发的令牌标记为可转发的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked forwardable.

value.span: 如果已发布标记为可向前的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the issued token is forwardable; otherwise, .

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst 的内容： 可向前元素。Represents the contents of the wst:Forwardable element. 此可选元素指示返回的令牌是否绑定到请求者的计算机或服务 (由`false`值)。This optional element indicates whether the returned token is bound to the requestor's computer or service (indicated by a `false` value). 此元素是在 Ws-trust 1.4 中引入的。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性与结合使用属性。This property used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ Issuer { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 wst:OnBehalfOf 标记的颁发者。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer of the wst:OnBehalfOf token.

value.span: 一个包含颁发者地址的 。

span.span: A that contains the address of the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:Issuer 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Issuer element. 此可选元素标识 wst:OnBehalfOf 元素中指定的令牌的颁发者。This optional element identifies the issuer of the token that is specified in the wst:OnBehalfOf element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ OnBehalfOf { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置代表发出请求的标识的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token for the identity on behalf of which the request is being made.

value.span: 包含要请求的标识标志的 。

span.span: A that contains the token of the identity for which the request is being made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:OnBehalfOf 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:OnBehalfOf element. 此可选元素指示请求者正在发出代表另一个标识请求。This optional element indicates that the requestor is making the request on behalf of another identity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ Participants { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将授权使用已颁发令牌的参与者。

span.span: Gets or sets the participants that are authorized to use the issued token.

value.span: 包含授权使用已发布的标识的参与者。

span.span: A that contains the participants that are authorized to use the issued token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： 参与者元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Participants element. 此可选元素标识有权使用该令牌的其他参与者。This optional element identifies additional participants that are authorized to use the token.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ProofEncryption { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于加密证明令牌的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be used to encrypt the proof token.

value.span: 一个包含令牌的 。

span.span: A that contains the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:ProofEncryption 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:ProofEncryption element. 此可选元素包含要用于加密校验密钥的令牌。This optional element contains the token to be used to encrypt the proof key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ Renewing { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 WS-Trust 续订请求的续订语义。

span.span: Gets or sets the renew semantics for a WS-Trust renew request.

value.span: 返回包含续订语义的 。

span.span: Returns that contains the renew semantics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst 的内容： 续订元素。Represents the contents of the wst:Renewing element. 此可选元素指定的 WS 信任续订请求的续订语义。This optional element specifies the renew semantics for a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ RenewTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 WS-Trust 续订请求中续订的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be renewed in a WS-Trust renew request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含要续订的令牌。

span.span: A that contains the token to be renewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst: renewtarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:RenewTarget element. 此元素包含有关要在 WS 信任续订的令牌信息续订请求。This element carries the information about the token to be renewed in a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ SecondaryParameters { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置其请求者不是发出方的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

value.span: 包含请求的次要参数的 ，即该请求者不是发信方的参数。

span.span: A that contains secondary parameters for the request; that is, parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:SecondaryParameters 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:SecondaryParameters element. 此可选元素包含为其请求者不是发信方的参数。This optional element contains parameters for which the requestor is not the originator. STS 可以选择使用此元素基于其策略中找到的值。An STS may choose to use the values found in this element based on its policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ValidateTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 WS-Trust 验证请求中验证的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be validated in a WS-Trust validate request.

value.span: 包含要验证的标志。

span.span: A that contains the token to be validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:ValidateTarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:ValidateTarget element. 此元素包含有关在 WS 信任验证的标记信息验证请求。This element carries the information about the token to be validated in a WS-Trust validate request.
